title: Arabia Mountain National Heritage Area: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           Arabia Mountain National Heritage Area 3350 Klondike Road   Lithonia, GA 30038                 Directions         The Arabia Mountain National Heritage Area lies just east of Atlanta along I-20.  It is a partnership area 40,000 large where visitors will find large, granite outcroppings, historic communities and spiritual spaces.  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Arabia Mountain National Heritage Area Arabia Mountain NHA is a partnership area and has several different locations that may or may not have visitor center locations, please check http://arabiaalliance.org/ for more information   Standard Hours    Sunday: Sunrise - Sunset   Monday: Sunrise - Sunset   Tuesday: Sunrise - Sunset   Wednesday: Sunrise - Sunset   Thursday: Sunrise - Sunset   Friday: Sunrise - Sunset   Saturday: Sunrise - Sunset             Weather           https://www.wunderground.com/q/zmw:30087.1.99999?sp=KGASTONE4         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Arabia Mountain NHA - $0.00 Arabia Mountain NHA is a partnership area and each area may charge it's own entrance fees.  Please visit http://arabiaalliance.org/ for more information.  There is not a federal fee to enter the NHA         Visitor Centers              Â    Explore a land that has taken 400 million years to form. The Arabia Mountain National Heritage Area lies just east of Atlanta along I-20. Dominated by two granite outcrops, it offers natural wonders, compelling history and heart-pumping activity.
